results.label: WhatsApp
results.description: WhatsApp Messenger (WAM) is a proprietary, cross-platform instant messaging application for smartphones. In addition to basic messaging WhatsApp Messenger users can send each other images, video and audio media messages. WhatsApp Messenger is available for iOS, BlackBerry OS, Android, Symbian and Windows Phone only. WhatsApp synchronizes with the phone's contact's book, so users do not need to add contacts in a separate book. Underlying communication is done using the open standard XMPP..
